website_summaries.verdict: A mostly-organic aftershave with low alcohol content that is ideal for sensitive skin.
pros: This balm uses several natural and organic ingredients for a mixture that is moisturizing and easy on the skin
The bottle design makes it easy to apply the right amount of balm, and most customers find that their skin feels softer and smoother afterward
Though there are cheaper options available, this is a reliable balm that uses mostly natural ingredients
cons: Some customers find the musky smell overpowering

customer_reviews.title: I was sucked in
customer_reviews.text: Just like many others. I see all these stellar reviews about how amazing this stuff is. Honestly I wasn't all that impressed. I have used it multiple times after shaves. I thought my Olay face lotion was better and less greasy. I purchased this with very high hopes based on numerous stellar reviews. After receiving it and trying it for a week I then ordered some Proraso and was much happier. Just depends on what your looking for. Its an ok product. I feel like it has way more hype then it deserves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy of a Smell
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, smells like pine chips used in animal cages, way too heavy of a cologne. Maybe with they right body chemistry this would work, but far too heavy a sent for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brush Stroke

customer_reviews.title: Won't pump.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped pumping after the first few days. Now I need to use the plastic stem to get the lotion out to apply it to my face. I read and ignored similar reviews. I wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Meh...Over priced, just as good as any other lotion, pump leaves 25% of product in bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was suckered in by the great reviews. It's a nice lotion, but not as nice as other similarly-priced luxury lotions for men. The sandalwood is nice, but I became bored with it. That's all just a matter of taste. Here's the problem: The pump can't get the last 25% of the product out of the bottle. So I can hit it hard on my hands "ketchup bottle style" for several minutes each day or just call it a loss. It's not so special that I want to get the remaining product out of the bottle. I won't buy it again...For the price, I can find something nicer and easier to use from L'Occitane.
customer_reviews.author: SinCityCigarMan

customer_reviews.title: The word "Best" is an understatement.
customer_reviews.text: Would give this product six stars if that was possible. Imagine the best after-shave balm you've ever used, one that soothes, calms, and lasts without being oily, and then imagine it with just a few drops of fine sandalwood oil to give it a very light but wonderful scent. This is one of those rare products that nails it, and could not possibly be improved. I can't recommend this highly enough for men looking for a lightly scented, superior after-shave balm. It is expensive no doubt, but a little goes a long way, and after all sometimes it's the little things in the morning that can help to make your day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Keener

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best Aftershave Balms
customer_reviews.text: I've had very little time using this and I can already say it has very well exceeded my expectations. The balm glides onto the skin very smoothly almost like lotion and does not feel dry in the slightest. The scent is very unique in its own way, but still has that signature sandalwood scent. Very strong. For the price I paid, the experience, the feeling, the smell, and the perfomance of all the ingredients is so worth it. I highly recommend anyone to try this for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Deion

customer_reviews.title: Manly smell and cures razor burn well
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this cream reminds me of a maduro cigar. Filled with complex spice and wood smells. Although the scent doesn't last long the effect of the cream serves its purpose well after you have applied it. The only hang up I have is the spout that extracts the cream. If you push to harshly, not much will come out. You need a gentle press. Also I have to have around 2-3 pumps in order to have enough product for my entire face. Otherwise, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bosquez

customer_reviews.title: "Earthy" then fades. Never smelled Sandalwood
customer_reviews.text: When first applied, I was reminded of a gerbil cage. Very earthy and cedar like. After about 20 minutes the smell subsides to barely noticeable. The lasting scent is much more subtle. I will say that the moisturizing is great and my skin feels much better. I shave with a safety razor so it is a very close shave and the balm soothes nicely. Still, for the price I am better off with Nivea Post Shave balm. I tried this for the sandal wood scent and was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Coldbrook

customer_reviews.title: Most soothing aftershave balm ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first bottle of your after-shave balm about a year ago. It was sandalwood scented. I'm sixty-three, have been shaving since I was thirteen, and this is the most soothing after-shave I've ever used. Loved the scent too! - sandalwood brought back great memories of the 60's and 70's :) Thought I'd try the the other scents you offer (Barbershop and Bay Rum), and can say I enjoy them both (although sandalwood remains my favorite!) If you ever decide to experiment with other scents, a patchouli/vanilla combo might be a good addition to your lineup. Many thanks...John :)
customer_reviews.author: John M Miller

customer_reviews.title: TINY!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, but doesn't last very long at all, doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, okay moisturizer if you reapply. And having to reapply leads me to the crazy tiny amount for the money! It's no better than big box store products and here on Amazon, aftershave balms (Nivea, Neutrogena, etc.). Amazon sells THREE PACKS for the price of one of these tiny bottles. All in all, a great idea, but poorly executed...
customer_reviews.author: pitdoug1998

customer_reviews.title: Great sandalwood scent, but with a minor packaging problem...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, whose scent matches perfectly with the Lather and Wood shaving cream. Unlike many other so-called sandalwood scented products, there are no intruding additional scents. I personally am not fond of the dispenser, which is a pump type. It takes special attention to figure out which direction the product is going to be dispensed, and the pump seems to be a bit erratic in the amount dispensed. With that flaw in mind, I reduced the rating by one star.
customer_reviews.author: Don From Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Face saving
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a few weeks but my skin feels noticeably better. I got this to help with easing the red shaving bumps that I have had for a long time now. I'm noticing that the red bumps are disappearing and my skin feels softer and noticeably less irritated. The ingredients are all pronounceable and the top ingredients are aloe vera, coconut, oil, things that are good for your skin. This will probably be my go-to post-shave balm going forward.
customer_reviews.author: D. MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: This is great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have long searched for all natural aftershave for sensitive skin. Have used The Art of Shaving aftershaves with good results. Decided to try something new and after research bought this cream and I really couldn't be happier with my decision! This is awesome aftershave! Has a beautiful earthy, manly smell , slightly stronger initially, but faints nicely after few minutes. It complements greatly my Hermes. I will surely buy this again and would recommend this cream to anyone, looking for a supreme, all natural product, US made!
customer_reviews.author: mihail andreev

customer_reviews.title: Nasty odor!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like an old shoe. Like sticking your face in a well worn yard sale shoe. Imagine finding the nastiest old leather shoe at a thrift store and then strapping that shoe to your face. Used once. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: ST3

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Soothing! I've put up with "The burn" of aftershave lotions that contained alcohol for years simply because I loved the smell. Dumb right? I ran out of Bay Rum and decided to try something different. When I first applied it, I thought it would make my face greasy but it was absorbed and left only razor burn relief and the wonderful smell of Sandlewood. I will continue to buy this product. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Claude R Graham Jr

customer_reviews.title: High Value Aftershave Balm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. It’s just as high quality as any of the major brand names, and without paying for that fancy label you save a lot of money. The applicator is also clever so you don’t use more than you need. I’ve bought this several times in both Sandalwood and no fragrance, I like them both and switch back and forth. Excellent for skin care. Your face will thank you for the kind treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: The Best after shave balm
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very dry climate. I had a beard for several years and descently shaved it off. Because of the dry climate and sensitive face after the beard shaving really upset my face. I found this balm on amazon and am certainly glad I did. My face is very soft an a little goes along way and last all days. I have been very pleased with this product...I recommend this product in the strongest manner
customer_reviews.author: Lonzo Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not my favorite, but this stuff works well. That is before my decision to grow a beard. The after shave lotion kept me from having those lovely razor burn rashes after starting to sweat. I will not knock off any stars because I knew that scent would not be for me, but this stuff works and that is ultimately what it was needed for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I shave with a single blade old style safety razor. At times this will leave your skin a little raw. This shaving balm is outstanding at soothing your skin. It has a light woodsy / sandelwood scent that is very agreeable and disappears in short order. I was so happy with this balm that I have ordered a second and will get more as needed. Also I will be looking into more "Leather and Wood" products as the seem to be of a high quality. Hope you have for same pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Now my head smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those balding guys that decided I would rather be the guy with the shaved head than the bald spot. I shave my head at least every other day, and I've needed something to add to my routine that moisturizes and smells good. After coming across this product and reading the reviews, I decided I would give it a shot. Well, as it turns out I was more than pleasantly surprised! My head feels super soft and smooth now, and it smells fantastic! I would definitely recommend this to anyone who shaves their head on a regular basis, and even if you just shave normally (I use it on my face and neck as well). Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: James Burns

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many, many "balms" and most fall short. Too much alcohol or too greasy or the sent is just overwhelming. This balm on the other hand, just works. It has just enough moisturizer and scent no sting from witchhazel, alcohol or any other unwanted astringent. I tried it on a lark, you know, the glass is half full thing and was pleasantly surprised. I'm a repeat customer for the shaving soap and it looks like I'll be a repeat for the balm too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: It Performs
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for two things in a shave balm. It has to perform and it has has to perform. This one performs. It goes on easily without leaving my hands greasy or looking to wipe them off. My face feels great all day. I was rotating between two other products but I find myself grabbing this most of the time. Scent is a personal thing and personally I really enjoy this one. They advertise it as the best, I haven't tried them all to know, but it is best I've used. I wish they would produce one with sunscreen and it would be the only product I would need.
customer_reviews.author: Texsox

customer_reviews.title: Woodsy and we’ll balanced
customer_reviews.text: Very earthy and calming, it’s great for anyone looking for a manly scent that is still somehow refreshing. Like all aftershaves it’s not going to last all day but it will stick around for a while and would be good for office situations where you can’t be overpowering people. I find myself using some in the evenings too just because I like the scent so much.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D McClane

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and the scent fades appropriately
customer_reviews.text: The Lather and Wood aftershave balm formula is spot on. It smells great and the scent fades appropriately. The balm itself does an outstanding job of soothing the skin after a shave, even after using some of the most aggressive DE safety razors. Unlike other balms, I found the Lather and Wood to leave the skin feeling ultra smooth and soft without any oily residue or other negatives. I highly recommend this product and look forward to larger size bottles to purchase. A very high quality, well formulated product that IMO is unmatched by other brands, boutique or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe8297

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the first time a couple of years ago and now it is my go-to after shave balm. I like the not overpowering scent. It is soothing for the both a razor and an elective shaver. I recently added the shaving oil as part of the regiment and was pleasantly surprised how much I like it. A perfect comment to the balm.
customer_reviews.author: Mufasa

customer_reviews.title: Not So Good
customer_reviews.text: The scent is more akin to cedar shavings. It reminds me of a fresh hamster cage. Also, the scent is faint and fades quickly. The feeling of the lotion is neither remarkably good nor bad. The lotion is not heavy nor does it leave a filmy feeling. The pump mechanism ejects the lotion so forcefully that it splatters.
customer_reviews.author: Team Cheep

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, great company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I couldn't find an alcohol based after shave I've used forever. Pros: No alcohol, so no burn after application. That was a surprise. Sandalwood is subtle, but a nice musk that obviates a need for cologne. Cons: Its easy for me to miss spots (see no alcohol burn) which can cause irritation throughout the day. Honestly, it's the people that make it for me. A few days after I received the after shave, I got an email asking about my experience. I replied and got an actual person's response. Lather & Wood seem like genuine people who care about their business and that's the 5-star clincher.
customer_reviews.author: Jake DeJarnette

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my boyfriend who normally dons a thick beard but has been shaving to properly wear PPE due to the COVID-19 outbreak. He used it for the first time last night and loved it! It made his skin very soft and helped reduce redness and dryness. He is very happy and will probably be getting some of your other products. Thank you! Amazing customer service also- they sent me and email asking me how I liked the product then sent me another bottle for free! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Arzaga

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Aftershave Balm with a unique scent and, better than some  of these well know brands.
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a well know brand as i have sensitive skin, however, due to the current lock down etc. I found this After-shave Balm with a Sandalwood Scent and moisturizer; when it arrived i tried it and was pleasantly surprised that it immediately soothed the skin and, i was also surprised by the sandalwood scent that was not over powering but just right. I would buy this again and will also let my associates know. A Good Aftershave Balm with a unique scent.
customer_reviews.author: James Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great for shaved head and face.  No skuttle bumps.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product, goes on non greasy, smoothes and makes it all feel good. Great Smell. Some constructive comments... would like to see this in a squeezable tube or plastic bottle. Dropped mine and just caught it before it shattered. A larger size wold be great as well. Thanks for a fine product!
customer_reviews.author: Phoink

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is what you need to try at least once in your life. Like a threesome.
customer_reviews.text: I was truly impressed with this product! This stuff soothes the skin just perfectly. I cut myself while shaving, I used this aftershave, no sting, no burn, just cool, healing balm- really. I love it! This stuff isn't a "thin" liquid. So, it was slightly thicker than I expected. But, it was so good, so healing, so impressive! I'll definitely buy it again when I'm out. This stuff was great! I'd buy it by the case if I had money. hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Not good all!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible smell to creamy gets all over the face and hard to rub in thought it would be great with all the great reviews it just went into the garbage pail. I am an experienced wet shaver sorry just being honest.
customer_reviews.author: BRAD "It is what it is!"

customer_reviews.title: Great aftershave!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third bottle of this aftershave. I used to use grocery store lotions but wanted something better. After some internet research I found this. I started with one bottle and did not expect a huge difference. I am surprised how much better this works versus the standard grocery store brand. I use one squirt on my finger and apply to my freshly shaved face every morning. The lotion soothes the skin and leaves a nice light scent. I have given these as gifts to my relatives. A very nice lotion with a nice finish. Try it and you'll enjoy it as well.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hal Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Quality men's aftershave lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite aftershave product. I have a tough facial hair and sensitive skin, Lather&Wood aftershave balm soothes without sting and does not leave any oily feeling or shine. I love the sandalwood scent as I don't like to smell like a cologne ad. If you are looking for a quality product give Lather & Wood a try. I'm confident you will agree it is great. The pre shave oil I also highly recommend. I am currently trying out the shaving soap and expect it to perform as well as their other products. I am not a paid employee or compensated by Lather&Wood just a guy who shaves with a actual safety razor and needed quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Martin1964

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin and great smell
customer_reviews.text: This after-shave balm is amazing. It smells so good and do help sooth the skin after shaving. I only use one pump when applying it. The smell is not overpowering so people walking by might not even notice. It smells pretty masculine but also a bit sophisticated. I shave every other day but still put it on after washing my face on the days I don't shave. This product surpassed my expectations so I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J.Black

customer_reviews.title: and it only occasionally smells like a hint of sandalwood
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 weeks. The smell is very faint, unfortunately, and it only occasionally smells like a hint of sandalwood. If you are looking for a strong scent, I would highly recommend getting a sandalwood cologne. That being said, I really like the product. It doesn't feel greasy and a little goes a long way. The smell is light and subtle (wish it was a little more) but the relief is great. My only gripes would be that the pump often spits out a lot more than you want or need and the scent is a bit misleading, otherwise you are getting a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It IS the Best
customer_reviews.text: "I received your Best Aftershave Balm today, having ordered it yesterday. You are right! It is the best aftershave I have tried. The scent is pleasant but definitely manly, reminding one of the fragrance of soap. The aftershave balm effectively soothes the razor burn." I will be purchasing more and will look to see if you have similar based deodorant. The lightening fast shipping (ordered it yesterday) and the reasonable price was also appreciated. Can't beat this deal!"
customer_reviews.author: Charles Angione

customer_reviews.title: Protects my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: "I have had a beard for the last seven years. One of the advantages of the beard is I did not have to shave my sensitive skin. My face is still sensitive but the pre and after shave does seem to make a difference. I also began using shaving soap with a brush and a double edged razor at the same time. I have had the closest shaves ever, it feels like the pre shave oil is really protecting my skin during the shave and the after shave lotion does seem to keep my face softer, smoother, and less irritated. At this point I would definitely purchase your products again."
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meechan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shave balm. The Sandalwood Scent smells so good and my wife keeps smelling me because she loves it. Feels good going on my shaved head and face. Ever since I started shaving again with a safety razor I bought this and love it. really soothes the head and face. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Popin

customer_reviews.title: This is great aftershave balm for several reasons
customer_reviews.text: This is great aftershave balm for several reasons. First, a little goes a long way. I know people say that about things, and then you buy them and realize a little doesn't go a long way. But really: with this product, a little does a lot. Second, the sandalwood scent is quite pleasant. I don't think it lasts all day, but it does for a little while after applying it. Third, and this is most important, the balm conditions the face all day long. It keeps the face soft and smooth. Fourth, every ingredient is all natural, so you know you're not putting some harmful chemicals or synthetic ingredients on your skin, which ultimately absorb into the body.
customer_reviews.author: David Huber

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't like the feeling after applying it. I'll probably go back to using art of shaving aftershave. My skin felt very sensitive afterwards. I used a safety razor and installed new blade so it wasn't that. I also did not appreciate it was not in a proper box. It was only the bottle as is.
customer_reviews.author: Peacoat Rider

customer_reviews.title: If you like the smell of the woods after a rain...
customer_reviews.text: This scent is light but heavenly... one of my favorites. I bought this for my husband and don't like really smelly after shave.. this is a unique scent and it is a smooth balm. I rubbed some on my hand and loved the feeling .. silky smooth. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: suescrapper

customer_reviews.title: Little to no scent.
customer_reviews.text: There is little to no scent and the main reason I purchased it was for the sandlewood scent. Too overpriced for just aftershave lotion. I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: GTG

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Product
customer_reviews.text: After comparing a couple of other high-quality after-shave balms, this ranks at the top of my list. While expensive, it is worth every penny. No itch, thick cream, full of ultra-high quality ingredients and does not leave skin shinny. Can be taken on air travel due to small size. Nice to see after-shaving balms refined to this level of perfection and still be affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Detrick

customer_reviews.title: The best after shave balm
customer_reviews.text: I have Bay Rum and Sandalwood. They are both very thick and rich. The fragrance stays with you for at least 4 hours under normal wear. I use this stuff every day and works nicely. After shaving it soothes my skin and I do not get any pimples, in grown hairs, or bumps with this stuff. I recommend it for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Great scent. Little bit does it.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome and a little goes a long way to seal and heal after shaving. All natural ingredients are awesome with great scent and minimal alcohol. I still often use a little Old Spice because, because, and top off with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Kenty

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I only wish it came in a larger bottle (more economical and environmentally friendly). I shave my head and use this product, thus I go through the tiny bottle fairly fast. I would have given it 5/5 if it came in a larger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: NC Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scent! :)
customer_reviews.text: I like scent of your after shave balm. It also make my skin moisturize enough. Getting good after shave balm so hard in south korea. I recommend your product to my younger brother and he want this product too. Thank you for support good product~ :)
customer_reviews.author: MinHyeong Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not very similar to Art of Shaving sandalwood
customer_reviews.text: Seems like quality ingredients. Not too fond of the smell. I was expecting something similar to the Art of Shaving Sandalwood cream/soap smell. However, it's much different. The smell doesn't linger very long after application. I would not purchase again as I'm very accustomed to the AOS sandalwood smell hence the 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I tried this!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another after shave lotion Aveeno which i liked but when it was time to reorder i decided to try this from Lather & Wood. I'm very happy i did! I have only good things to say about this product and company. I received it on time. It goes on smooth and is refreshing. It has a subtle scent that I like. The pump feature is convenient and a little goes a long way. One or two pumps is plenty. On top of that the customer service is well above average. They sent notes thanking me for my order and following up to make sure i was happy. You can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: tohandley

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive users
customer_reviews.text: I really like this after shave balm and I have no skin irritation or issues from using this product, I have very sensitive skin and this helps a lot. I bought this because I'm on a search for all natural shave products with no harsh chemicals. I have found this product to be easy to apply and enjoyable to use with a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana DIY

customer_reviews.title: Great product but dispenser needs fixed
customer_reviews.text: I love the sandalwood scent and it is great as a moisturizer for sensitive skin...but the pump on the bottle doesn't work very well so need to open too use product. If it were in a tube or bottle I would probably give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: OCDog

customer_reviews.title: Helps with razor burn and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had a chance to use it a few times. Razor burn was a big problem for me but I'm delighted to say that after using this stuff for a week it has nearly disappeared. I also really love the way it smells. I like how light the smell is but I wish the scent lasted longer. It seems to only be noticeable for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: If used in moderation, this stuff is great. Too much (for me) resulted in some blocked up pores. To be perfectly fair, I also wasn't rubbing the stuff in as well as I could have. The ingredients are natural and encourage healing after shaving. Just one more time though - for me, moderation is key to a good outcome. I have insanely sensitive skin, and though I trust this stuff implicitly now, it came with an adjustment period.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Radle

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This aftershave balm my husband was skeptical, especially because it was being purchased online. He is very old school and like his usual aftershave, but his skin has become sensitive and his usual just was not cutting it for him. I decided to do some research and came across This Lather and wood after shave balm. And I have to say, my husband loves it. It is perfect for his skin type and we both love the smell. I will definatley be ordering more of this for him and we may be trying some of their other products as well. We recommend giving this balm a try.
customer_reviews.author: MissAma

customer_reviews.title: You want the sandalwood? You can't handle the sandalwood!
customer_reviews.text: Best sandalwood aftershave lotion bar-none. A little goes a long way (and for the price per ounce it should). It does have alcohol in it but doesn't burn my skin. The scent is unapologeticly male with the sandalwood smelling like the real deal and without other scents mixed in. It also sticks with you for a solid 6 hours before it starts fading.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After shave just isn't meant to be a greasy pump bottle. Bottle get clogged easily, I can imagine what it does to skin pores. Doesn't last for long, pricey. What scent? I see from some reviews where customers have been sent a free bottle for 5 star reviews, I'm sure they can afford to at the price they are selling it for.
customer_reviews.author: PC Pro

customer_reviews.title: smells a bit odd
customer_reviews.text: Smells a bit musky to be honest... not sure if this bottles been sitting around the amazon warehouse for a while or something? it sure doesnt smell fresh... it kind of smells like a mixture of shaving cream, end of day male musk, and an ashtray... literally lol... Can someone let me know if this is supposed to smell like this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lingering scent, excellent size for travel, great finish
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. I was a little worried at first, being used to ordering liquid aftershave, that the 2oz size would not last long; thankfully, it takes very little to cover my face well. It has a very pleasant lingering smell and no greasy residue on my hands afterward.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eastlund

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but my skin did not.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great - I like that it’s natural. If I used after shaving - my skin did not like it. Tried applying otherwise and didn’t cause problems. Eh. Not a perfect match for me but a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Another Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product from a great company! I have been using Lather & Wood products for over a year now and this was my reorder of the after-shave balm. Not greasy, with a great scent and really makes my skin soft after shaving with my double-edged safety razor. I will continue to use their products as long as they continue to make them. Thanks Lather & Wood!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell but
customer_reviews.text: I was very please when I first put this on. But after a couple of hours my face was burning from razor burn. I have tried it a couple of times. But it just does not keep my face from burning.
customer_reviews.author: Jake23

customer_reviews.title: An aftershave balm that lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time to purchase this item. This aftershave balm is soothing to the skin, even after a close shave...great feel, no sting. The scent is very mild, very pleasant, a nice change from most overwhelmingly perfumed after shave lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spade

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! (But weak scent)
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this doesn't have a 5 star rating is due to the scent. The most notable smell is actually what ever the moisturizing component is, not the sandlewood. It's an amazing moisturizer, just wish it was just a little more pungent and lasted more than just a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: KuJo

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy products from this company
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy products from this company. The scent isn't too strong and it does help sooth the skin after a shave. This has lasted me quite a while, but then again, I only shave about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing this product highly reviewed on a shaving website, I came here to also read reviews from actual buyers and made my purchase. I must say, the balm exceeded my expectations! Very minimum amount needed, soaks right into your skin, and has a pleasant mild sandalwood scent, not too overpowering at all. I live in the Northeast where the weather is cold now, and after shaving, I use the balm on my entire face as a skin moisturizer with great results. I would HIGHLY recommend this balm and will be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Doria

customer_reviews.title: Love this post shave
customer_reviews.text: This aftershave it awesome i really am enjoying the smell and it does soothe like its suppose to do even when i was trying for the first time on my merkur futur Additional notes This product works great i have ordered it once and a friend asked for a good aftershave and i recommended this one because i feel it real soothing and it smells and feels good in my face so i placed an order for him i also ordered him a post shave because i really do enjoy your product
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: I love this after-shave balm
customer_reviews.text: I love this after-shave balm. I've been using it for two weeks now and I really enjoy it. One squeeze of the pump and the single dub it's all I need after every shave. I wasn't sure, if the scent isn't going to be too much, but it's very delicate and just perfect for my taste. I really like the soothing feeling of this after-shave and the overall experience feels very natural and manly. The company's customer service is top notch! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mariusz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for dry skin/razor burn
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and this is the only lotion/balm that will keep it under control without looking like my face is covered in oil. This has also stopped ALL razor burn on my neck area. The smell is amazing and I just ordered my second bottle! Update- I have been using this product for over a year now and still have ZERO complaints!! the first two bottles have lasted me thus far and I use three pumps every day!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Long-Pace

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic After-Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are very good. I've been using a safety razor for about 3 weeks and decided I NEEDED an aftershave balm. I did research and found this one. I've only used it a few times now, but did notice that my face was smoother, and healed quicker from a shave with zero irritation. The light sandalwood fragrance is a nice touch and not overpowering at all. Go ahead, you gotta order it and try it. Their customer support is second to none as well! You and your face will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: David Bustle

customer_reviews.title: A great, quality product with wholesome ingredients that gets the ...
customer_reviews.text: A great, quality product with wholesome ingredients that gets the job done right every time. Feels great on my face after a shave my de razor but it also works when I am in a rush and have to use my cartridge razor. Wish the bottle was bigger but with shaving about every other day I still have almost half a bottle left after half a year since I use 1-2 pumps per shave. Have not found another after-shave that had better ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a little thicker than other products has a pleasant fragrance that my wife compliments and it seems to moisturize my skin better keeping it looking healthier looking
customer_reviews.text: I have used similar products but found this to be my preferred after-shave lotion for over a year now. It is a little thicker than other products I've tried and has a pleasant fragrance. It also seems to moisturize my skin better than other products which I think helps keep it looking healthier. Finally, I appreciate that the top readily unscrews so I am able to use every last bit possible from each bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: the smell is great..
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product switching over to the more "natural" and "hand-crafted" shaving products and I must say it has been a pleasure using this. My skin after a shave feels so smooth and silky, and I haven't had any ingrown hairs so far nor irritated skin. On top of that, the smell is great... Subtle but manly. Really nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Fair Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, my husband likes and approves. I’m not a fan of the scent buts it’s not that bad. I thought it had essential oils only and no added fragrance but I was wrong, there is a fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Aftershave!
customer_reviews.text: I love this aftershave. It soothes and moisturizes my skin after shaving, without any burning sensations. Plus, it has a mild, masculine scent. Great product that should last quite a while. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: On My Road to Health

customer_reviews.title: Great Soothing Product for Avid Shavers
customer_reviews.text: First off, I want to express to you how much I wholesomely enjoy your product. The only stipulation I have is the volume/quantity. I frequently shave my face and entire head, and find myself constantly running low! I understand the business aspect of things, but from a consumer perspective, is there any way to access an increased quantity? Say maybe a 4 fl oz container or larger? I enjoy and use the product so frequent, that I am willing to buy a larger supply! Keep up the outstanding work!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: The smell is awesome. Only complaint is I wish it came in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only aftershave that I have felt actually does something. The smell is awesome. Only complaint is I wish it came in a squeeze bottle and a larger one at that. It is very difficult to get the last of it out of this bottle and it doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Geckoeyes

customer_reviews.title: If you like pine trees...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, but I honestly am not a big fan. It is strong and smells like pine sap. If that is what you're looking for, then I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Ntohing special
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after shave because of it's glowing review. Even though it is much more expensive than some of its comparable product. I have been using this for 2 weeks now. There is nothing special about this aftershave, it feels like regular lotion, doesn't even provide a cooling sensation. The spray mechanism is also not smooth at all, it splashes on my vanity a few times. I would save some money and go back to buying regular $2 dollar gillette aftershaves.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Soothing, clean no residue aftershave balm
customer_reviews.text: I use this aftershave balm after shaving my head and trimming my beard. It imparts a clean, soothing, moisturizing lotion with no residue. It has a light sandalwood scent, but not as strong as it's companion sandalwood shaving soap. I will definitely reorder this product and have recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Sr

customer_reviews.title: awesome potion!!!
customer_reviews.text: lovely balm for after shaving. absolutley love the smell which is exactly the same as the shave soap. as with the soap and after shave.....wish the smell lasted longer because this is my favorite scent. warm spicy sandalwood. no sting upon application. not sticky. smells great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: For adult workers it works best!
customer_reviews.text: I am a male adult film star. My work requires daily shaving and grooming of my pubic areas. Razor burns and shaving bumps are unacceptable while filming and this product prevents them from occurring. My female colleagues and co-stars all comment at how much they like the scent of the sandalwood, it smells very masculine they have said.
customer_reviews.author: LadyUstriess

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite? Definitely.
customer_reviews.text: I've used your sandalwood after-shave balm for a month now, and I have to say that I definitely like it. It absorbs fairly rapidly and doesn't leave you feeling greasy or sticky. The sandalwood is much better than I was expecting as lot of times it kind of smells like sandalwood or has a faint smell that is barely there. I think this hits a good midpoint. I already have a second bottle waiting in the wings and will buy again. A+
customer_reviews.author: A. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like the after shave. Have there been any thoughts on making a bigger size? I shave my head so I use it both for face and head. That is a lot of real estate to cover and I go through it pretty quickly. Also (my opinion) is it would be great if it was in a container similar to the eye cream. It is really hard to get the last bit out of the jar with the pump and I don't like any to go to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Nice light fragrance
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me since I don't like shaving and my skin is a little sensitive. I wasn't sure if I would like it but after I tried it I really like it. I would say give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: m betts

customer_reviews.title: I was not very happy when i saw such a tiny bottle and i ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not very happy when i saw such a tiny bottle and i thought its not going to last my more then a month. when i used it first time i realized you need very little of time aftershave as its like a cream that you can see when i apply on my face. i like the smell and it does not give any burn when you apply it. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Malik

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say there customer service is amazing! Without saying too much I like this product but don't see myself buying it again, I really have to lather it up one or twice in order to go through the day with out feeling razor burn. Keep in mind I do shave agents the grain for a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong sandalwood scent
customer_reviews.text: The product itself feels decent on the skin. I cannot say that it completely heals razor burn, but what I can say is that the sandalwood stench is evident from 100 miles. Had I known, I would have purchased the unscented version. It is entirely too strong of an odor. I will attempt to gift it to someone who has lost their sense of smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Old man smell
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine I'm sure, as the vast majority of other users are satisfied with its performance, but I couldn't get past the distinct old man smell of this balm. I wouldn't recommend this product for anyone sensitive to scents.
customer_reviews.author: GearEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: My Husband's Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves this aftershave lotion! It moisturizes well without any irritation to his face, which is important to him as he has had skin sensitivity issues in the past. The sandalwood scent is very pleasing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hall

customer_reviews.title: Decent aftershave
customer_reviews.text: The product works and smells fine (sandlewood). I was a little disappointed at the size of the bottle vs the price. I probably will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bittersweet

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I will admit: I like Lather & Wood's Face Moisturizer better than this After-Shave Balm — I think mostly because of the Sandalwood scent. (The Face Moisturizer is unscented so it doesn't interfere with other scents I prefer to use.) That said, this lotion absorbs well, is not greasy, and leaves skin feeling smooth and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: soft, soothing fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Bought it recently, so have only used it a couple of times so far, and it works pretty good. Has a soft, soothing fragrance that's perfect. And the seller has been super nice! They wrote me an email asking if I were satisfied with the product, and when I said I was, they shipped me another bottle for free!
customer_reviews.author: Tuhin Bhattacharjee

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my face feeling good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the trio of products(sold separately as the pre shave oil, lather, and after shave lotion) and they work really well, additionally my wife enjoys the smell of the products. I have a full beard so I only shave some clean up every week or so they should last a long time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Selander

customer_reviews.title: Great Aftershave Balm
customer_reviews.text: Really a good product for the price. I typically use Loccitane aftershave balm which is really great, except a little heavy for the summer/warmer months. This product is 1/2 the price of Art of Shaving but I think it is a better product than their version of Sandalwood balm. They managed to achieve a solid combo of emollient and astringent...fairly well balanced. I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i get a full erection every time i use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Reza

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent and Soothing Balm
customer_reviews.text: Great sandlewood scent that is just a bit stronger than other shaving balm brands I have tried- which is a good thing. Not overpowering at all. I have sensitive skin and it calms down any irritation almost immediately. I’m sold on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This is a Very Small Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order, and have to say I'm rather shocked at the size of the bottle. Somehow I didn't realize I was paying over $16 for TWO ounces of this product. In my haste in ordering, I read 4 ounces somewhere in the description, but in rechecking the I found that the 4 ounces is the shipping weight, not the content. I would never have ordered such a small bottle had I read the fine print. I may just return it, I'm so disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted a sandalwood after shave.
customer_reviews.text: I misunderstood what this product is. I was hoping for an aftershave that smells like sandalwood. This stuff is greasy lotion. It's my fault I didn't read the discrimination more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Smells wonderful and soothes wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect match to a perfect shave! The after affect is excellent and right on point. The scent is not brutally over bearing. Didn’t feel one bit of razor burn all day. It just works!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie
